custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT {AssetEntrySet.*} FROM AssetEntrySet INNER JOIN AssetSharingEntry AS AssetSharingEntry1 ON (AssetSharingEntry1.classPK = AssetEntrySet.assetEntrySetId) [$JOIN_BY$] WHERE (AssetEntrySet.modifiedTime [$MODIFIED_TIME_COMPARATOR$] ?) AND (AssetEntrySet.parentAssetEntrySetId = ?) AND (AssetSharingEntry1.classNameId = ?) AND ( [$SHARED_TO$] [$ASSET_TAG_NAMES$] ) ORDER BY AssetEntrySet.createTime DESC
INNER JOIN AssetSharingEntry AS AssetSharingEntry2 ON (AssetSharingEntry1.classNameId = AssetSharingEntry2.classNameId) AND (AssetSharingEntry1.classPK = AssetSharingEntry2.classPK)

INNER JOIN AssetEntry ON (AssetEntry.classPK = AssetEntrySet.assetEntrySetId) LEFT JOIN AssetEntries_AssetTags ON (AssetEntries_AssetTags.entryId = AssetEntry.entryId) LEFT JOIN AssetTag ON (AssetTag.tagId = AssetEntries_AssetTags.tagId)
SELECT DISTINCT {AssetEntrySetLike.*} FROM AssetEntrySetLike WHERE (AssetEntrySetLike.assetEntrySetId = ?) AND NOT ( (AssetEntrySetLike.classNameId = ?) AND (AssetEntrySetLike.classPK = ?) )

SELECT DISTINCT sharedToClassNameId, sharedToClassPK FROM AssetSharingEntry INNER JOIN AssetEntrySet ON (AssetSharingEntry.classPK = AssetEntrySet.assetEntrySetId) WHERE (AssetEntrySet.parentAssetEntrySetId = ?) AND (AssetSharingEntry.classNameId = ?)
